snippet.title: Rotwood - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Rotwood on Steam! https://klei.gg/Rotwood Rotwood is a 1-4 player hack-and-slash dungeon crawler by Klei Entertainment the makers of Don't Starve and Mark of the Ninja. Battle corrupted beasts, gather what remains, and forge a safe haven with your friends.

Hack and slash your way through the Rotwood in this rogue-like dungeon crawler. Explore and fight through a labyrinthian maze of dense forest and vicious vegetation with up to 3 of your friends. Forge your path through ever-increasing challenges and rewards to bring the spoils of your adventure back and craft new weapons and armor or fortify your safe haven.

-------------------------------------------
Follow Klei Other Places!
-------------------------------------------
Twitter: https://twitter.com/klei
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kleientertainment
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/kleientertainment
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/kleientertainment
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/kleient
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/klei
Forums: https://forums.kleientertainment.com

#Rotwood #Klei Entertainment  #pcgamingshow
